entry.dcterms:title: The Inequalities of Wages in Hungary 1972-1995
entry.dcterms:creator: Nagy, Ildikó
entry.dcterms:subject: TÁRKI Joint Research Center TDATA-F75: The Inequalities of Wages in Hungary 1972-1995. data sheet. Version: 2007-01-19
entry.dcterms:creator: Ábrahám, Árpád
Kézdi, Gábor
entry.dcterms:contributor: Hungarian Academy of Sciences Economic Sciences Research Center
Hungarian Academy of Sciences Economic Sciences Research Center
entry.dcterms:description: analysis of the long-term (1972-96) labor market trends in Hungary (employment, wages, unemployment) along the lines of birth cohorts, gender, and education; separation of demand and supply effects
entry.dcterms:subject: income, property and savings
labour and employment
economic conditions and indicators
gender and gender roles
person
aggregate data
time-series

During the survey, data from the Employment (1992-1996) data of the Hungarian Central Statistical Office (KSH) Unified Population Data Collection System, from the KSH income survey(1972-1987), the wage scale survey of the National Labor Center (OMK) in 1986, 1989, 1992, and 1994-96, and 1990 census data were used.
Secondary analysis.
A
